Articles.Content:
Hello everyone again! so I was looking up atmosphere mods but none work for ksp 1.0.2 and I cant find anything... and I need help for finding one mod that works or a work around.

Not to mention what happened to my mechjeb now it incompatible with the with ksp 1.0.2 Hotfix.

A post with almost the same title is currently sitting 2 line under yours and has the answer.

As for MJ it was updated 2 days ago.
Oh well and wheres the other forum page?
